name: Davis Motomiya
effect: [Start of Your Turn] If you have 2 memory or less, set your memory to 3.On Play] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 blue and 1 green Digimon card among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.
security_effect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.
